Articles.Content:
Hi, I\'m Ryan with the slightly risque username of ManOnMunAction. KSP is pretty much the game I\'ve wanted for years but didn\'t know it.

I haven\'t yet landed on the Mun, but I\'ve at least hit it a few times in spectacular fashion. Lately I\'ve been trying to launch satellites as best I can. I\'ve actually studied orbital dynamics, so you\'d think I\'d have some intuition for orbits, but I really don\'t. That\'s why I launch satellites, since I feel it\'s more about creating the most complicated deployment possible!

Anyway, I hope to do some mod development, and I would really like to help start up a new Kerbal Space Repository since I heard the original one has been down.

I look forward to getting to know all of you!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Welcome to our forums!

Happy crashing and exploding!
Welcome to the forums. Have fun launching and finding what the forums hold.
